name: Markscheider Kunst
description: '''Markscheider Kunst''' (Маркшейдер Кунст) is a [[ska]] band from [[Saint Petersburg]], Russia. It plays [[afro-rock]], [[soukous]], [[ska]] and [[reggae]]. The band was founded in 1992 by [[geology]] students from Saint Petersburg. Lead singer Sergei Yefremenko died on 22 January 2024, at the age of 51.
